verifier.description: LLM verification of evidence presence for uncertain cases
verifier.conclusion: LLM Verifier achieves AUROC close to baseline (0.8931 vs 0.8972), excellent at ruling out negative cases (99% accuracy on NEG)

a10_classifier.description: LLM classification of A.10 (suicidal ideation) criterion
a10_classifier.conclusion: LLM-only A.10 classification UNDERPERFORMS baseline (0.56 vs 0.66). Without retrieval context, the model struggles with nuanced suicidal ideation detection.

reranker.description: LLM listwise reranking of evidence sentences
reranker.conclusion: LLM Reranker shows significant position bias (0.507). Only 9.8% of samples have low bias, suggesting the model is susceptible to ordering effects.

summary.best_use_case: LLM Verifier for uncertain case verification
limitations: A.10 classifier needs retrieval context to match baseline
recommendations: Use LLM Verifier as a second-stage filter for UNCERTAIN predictions
Integrate A.10 classifier with retrieval pipeline rather than standalone
Apply position bias mitigation (e.g., shuffle+aggregate) for reranking
